name: Ogmia: Chains of Wisdom
description:
Man is condemned... to be free to choose its own chains.

Experience this action-packed, narrative-driven dungeon crawler where every new game is different thanks to its procedural level generation, driven by the Dungeon Master System! Fight your way through and discover the true meaning of knowledge!

...Psst, hey!

Don't tell anybody, but you can enable a cheat mode by pressing '4' and '2' at the same time on the keyboard if you find trouble completing the game, or just want to play around and push the boundaries of your experience!
